div.p: This value set expansion contains 6 concepts.

td.a: First bOPV dose from the primary series was administered-115

tr.td: First bOPV dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Type of dose" = "Primary series" and "Type of poliovirus dose" = "bOPV") = 1

td.a: First IPV dose from the primary series was administered-76

tr.td: First IPV dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Type of poliovirus dose" = "IPV") = 1

td.a: Second bOPV dose from the primary series was administered-115

tr.td: Second bOPV dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Type of dose" = "Primary series" and "Type of poliovirus dose" = "bOPV") = 2

td.a: Second IPV dose from the primary series was administered-76

tr.td: Second IPV dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Type of poliovirus dose" = "IPV") = 2

td.a: Third bOPV dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-107

tr.td: Third bOPV dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SPolioBOPVPlusIPV for IMMZ.D18.S.Polio.bOPV plus IPV schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Bivalent oral polio vaccine (bOPV) plus inactivated polio vaccine (IPV) schedule
